QxtSemaphore Class Reference
[QxtCore module]

system wide semaphore (former QxtSingleInstance) More... 

 #include <QxtSemaphore>
  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Functions

  • QxtSemaphore ( QString uniqueID )
  • ~QxtSemaphore ( )
  • bool trylock ( )
  • bool unlock ( )

Detailed Description

QxtSemaphore instance("com.mycompany.foobla.uniquestring");
if(!instance.trylock())
{
     qDebug("already started")
}

Note that the semaphore is autoaticly unlocked on destruction, but not on segfault,sigkill,etc...!
